types_of_data_collected: User prompts and spoken inputs
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (text or voice input to Gemini Apps)
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, develop new services, personalize services, customize services, communicate with users, measure performance, protect Google/users/public, improve generative AI models and machine-learning technologies
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime; reviewed chats retained up to 3 years even after deletion

types_of_data_collected: Files, videos, screens, photos, and browser page content shared with Gemini Apps
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (file uploads and screen sharing)
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, develop new services, personalize services, customize services, communicate with users, measure performance, protect Google/users/public, improve generative AI models and machine-learning technologies
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime; reviewed chats retained up to 3 years even after deletion

types_of_data_collected: Transcripts and recordings of Gemini Live interactions (audio, video, screens)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (during Gemini Live sessions)
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, develop new services, personalize services, customize services, communicate with users, measure performance, protect Google/users/public, improve generative AI models and machine-learning technologies
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime; reviewed chats retained up to 3 years even after deletion

types_of_data_collected: User feedback
methods_of_collection: Directly from users
data_usage: Maintain and improve services, develop new services, improve generative AI models and machine-learning technologies
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Up to 3 years (retained with reviewed chats, not deleted when user deletes activity)

types_of_data_collected: Names and custom instructions of Gems
methods_of_collection: Directly from users
data_usage: Provide services, personalize services, customize services
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Instructions for Gemini (Saved Info)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users
data_usage: Provide services, personalize services, customize services
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Generated content (text, code, audio, images, video, public links, citations, chat summaries, personalized insights)
methods_of_collection: Automatically generated by Gemini Apps during use
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, develop new services, personalize services, improve generative AI models and machine-learning technologies
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime; reviewed content retained up to 3 years even after deletion

types_of_data_collected: Connected apps and Google services data (Search history, YouTube history, Chrome page context and URLs)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from connected Google services
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, personalize services, customize services
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Device and browser information (identifiers, browser type and settings, device type and settings, operating system)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from devices and browsers accessing Gemini Apps
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services, measure performance, protect Google/users/public
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Up to 3 years (retained with reviewed chats); some data retained until Google Account deletion

types_of_data_collected: Interaction logs, performance metrics, crash and debug information
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected during app/browser/device interaction with Gemini Apps
data_usage: Maintain and improve services, measure performance, protect Google/users/public
retention_period: Retained for legitimate business or legal purposes (security, fraud prevention, financial record-keeping); some data retained until Google Account deletion

types_of_data_collected: System permissions and device data (call logs, message logs, contacts, installed apps, language preferences, screen content)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from mobile devices with user permission
data_usage: Provide services (help users keep in touch, interact with apps, speak to Gemini, act on screen content), personalize services
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Smart home device names and playlists
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from connected devices and services
data_usage: Provide services, personalize services
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Interactions with public Gemini Apps content
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected during user interactions
data_usage: Maintain and improve services, measure performance
retention_period: Not specified

types_of_data_collected: Supplemental information from opt-in features
methods_of_collection: Directly from users through opt-in supplemental features
data_usage: Provide services, maintain and improve services
retention_period: Not specified

types_of_data_collected: Location information (general area from device, IP address, Home/Work addresses)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from devices, IP addresses, and Google Account
data_usage: Provide services, personalize services, customize services
third_party_disclosure: Human reviewers (including trained reviewers from service providers)
retention_period: Up to 3 years (retained with reviewed chats); some data retained until Google Account deletion

types_of_data_collected: Subscription information
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected for paid Gemini subscriptions
data_usage: Provide services, financial record-keeping
retention_period: Retained for legitimate business or legal purposes (financial record-keeping)

types_of_data_collected: Calling or texting history (for users 18+ who upgrade)
methods_of_collection: Imported from Web & App Activity to Gemini Apps Activity
data_usage: Improve Gemini Apps experience (contact suggestions)
retention_period: Default 18 months (customizable to 3 months, 36 months, or indefinite); manually deletable anytime

types_of_data_collected: Unintended activation data (accidental voice or touch activations)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected when Gemini Apps activate unintentionally
data_usage: Improve services, improve Gemini models and generative AI models, reduce unintended activations
retention_period: Not specified

types_of_data_collected: Canvas app interaction data
methods_of_collection: Directly from users during Canvas app interactions
data_usage: Provided to Canvas app creators for their own purposes
third_party_disclosure: Canvas app creators (who can save data where they choose), anyone with public link to the app
retention_period: Determined by Canvas app creator; stored in Firebase by Google but may be stored elsewhere by creator

types_of_data_collected: Frequency of Gemini Apps usage
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected during service use
data_usage: Measure performance, improve services
retention_period: Retained until Google Account deletion
